name: Heroes Of Hellas 4: Birth Of Legend
description: Be the hero Olympus needs and rise from its ashes today!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB 3D DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 3 GHZ processor or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 350 MB available space
